an9.13:1.1: Atha kho ayasma mahakotthiko yenayasma sariputto tenupasankami; upasankamitva ayasmata sariputtena saddhim sammodi.
an9.13:1.2: Sammodaniyam katham saraniyam vitisaretva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinno kho ayasma mahakotthiko ayasmantam sariputtam etadavoca:
an9.13:1.3: “kim nu kho, avuso sariputta, ‘yam kammam ditthadhammavedaniyam, tam me kammam samparayavedaniyam hotu’ti, etassa atthaya bhagavati brahmacariyam vussati”ti?
an9.13:2.1: “Kim panavuso sariputta, ‘yam kammam samparayavedaniyam tam me kammam ditthadhammavedaniyam hotu’ti, etassa atthaya bhagavati brahmacariyam vussati”ti?
an9.13:3.1: “Kim nu kho, avuso sariputta, ‘yam kammam sukhavedaniyam, tam me kammam dukkhavedaniyam hotu’ti, etassa atthaya bhagavati brahmacariyam vussati”ti?
an9.13:4.1: “Kim panavuso, sariputta, ‘yam kammam dukkhavedaniyam, tam me kammam sukhavedaniyam hotu’ti, etassa atthaya bhagavati brahmacariyam vussati”ti?
an9.13:5.1: “Kim nu kho, avuso sariputta, ‘yam kammam paripakkavedaniyam, tam me kammam aparipakkavedaniyam hotu’ti, etassa atthaya bhagavati brahmacariyam vussati”ti?

an9.13:7.1: “Kim nu kho, avuso sariputta, ‘yam kammam bahuvedaniyam, tam me kammam appavedaniyam hotu’ti, etassa atthaya bhagavati brahmacariyam vussati”ti?
an9.13:8.1: “Kim panavuso sariputta, ‘yam kammam appavedaniyam, tam me kammam bahuvedaniyam hotu’ti, etassa atthaya bhagavati brahmacariyam vussati”ti?
an9.13:9.1: “Kim nu kho, avuso sariputta, ‘yam kammam vedaniyam, tam me kammam avedaniyam hotu’ti, etassa atthaya bhagavati brahmacariyam vussati”ti?
an9.13:10.1: “Kim panavuso sariputta, ‘yam kammam avedaniyam, tam me kammam vedaniyam hotu’ti, etassa atthaya bhagavati brahmacariyam vussati”ti?
an9.13:11.1: “‘Kim nu kho, avuso sariputta, yam kammam ditthadhammavedaniyam tam me kammam samparayavedaniyam hotuti, etassa atthaya bhagavati brahmacariyam vussati’ti, iti puttho samano ‘no hidam, avuso’ti vadesi.
an9.13:12.1: ‘Kim panavuso sariputta, yam kammam samparayavedaniyam tam me kammam ditthadhammavedaniyam hotuti, etassa atthaya bhagavati brahmacariyam vussati’ti, iti puttho samano ‘no hidam, avuso’ti vadesi.
an9.13:13.1: ‘Kim nu kho, avuso sariputta, yam kammam sukhavedaniyam tam me kammam dukkhavedaniyam hotuti, etassa atthaya bhagavati brahmacariyam vussati’ti, iti puttho samano ‘no hidam, avuso’ti vadesi.
an9.13:14.1: ‘Kim panavuso sariputta, yam kammam dukkhavedaniyam tam me kammam sukhavedaniyam hotuti, etassa atthaya bhagavati brahmacariyam vussati’ti, iti puttho samano ‘no hidam, avuso’ti vadesi.
an9.13:15.1: ‘Kim nu kho, avuso sariputta, yam kammam paripakkavedaniyam tam me kammam aparipakkavedaniyam hotuti, etassa atthaya bhagavati brahmacariyam vussati’ti, iti puttho samano ‘no hidam, avuso’ti vadesi.
an9.13:16.1: ‘Kim panavuso sariputta, yam kammam aparipakkavedaniyam tam me kammam paripakkavedaniyam hotuti, etassa atthaya bhagavati brahmacariyam vussati’ti, iti puttho samano ‘no hidam, avuso’ti vadesi.
an9.13:17.1: ‘Kim nu kho, avuso sariputta, yam kammam bahuvedaniyam tam me kammam appavedaniyam hotuti, etassa atthaya bhagavati brahmacariyam vussati’ti, iti puttho samano ‘no hidam, avuso’ti vadesi.
an9.13:18.1: ‘Kim panavuso sariputta, yam kammam appavedaniyam tam me kammam bahuvedaniyam hotuti, etassa atthaya bhagavati brahmacariyam vussati’ti, iti puttho samano ‘no hidam, avuso’ti vadesi.
an9.13:19.1: ‘Kim nu kho, avuso sariputta, yam kammam vedaniyam tam me kammam avedaniyam hotuti, etassa atthaya bhagavati brahmacariyam vussati’ti, iti puttho samano ‘no hidam, avuso’ti vadesi.
an9.13:20.1: ‘Kim panavuso sariputta, yam kammam avedaniyam tam me kammam vedaniyam hotuti, etassa atthaya bhagavati brahmacariyam vussati’ti, iti puttho samano ‘no hidam, avuso’ti vadesi.
an9.13:20.2: Atha kimattham carahavuso, bhagavati brahmacariyam vussati”ti?
an9.13:21.1: “Yam khvassa, avuso, annatam adittham appattam asacchikatam anabhisametam, tassa nanaya dassanaya pattiya sacchikiriyaya abhisamayaya bhagavati brahmacariyam vussatiti.
an9.13:21.2: Kim panassavuso, annatam adittham appattam asacchikatam anabhisametam, yassa nanaya dassanaya pattiya sacchikiriyaya abhisamayaya bhagavati brahmacariyam vussatiti?
an9.13:21.3: ‘Idam dukkhan’ti khvassa, avuso, annatam adittham appattam asacchikatam anabhisametam.
an9.13:21.4: Tassa nanaya dassanaya pattiya sacchikiriyaya abhisamayaya bhagavati brahmacariyam vussati.
an9.13:21.5: ‘Ayam dukkhasamudayo’ti khvassa, avuso …pe… ‘ayam dukkhanirodho’ti khvassa, avuso …pe…
an9.13:21.6: ‘ayam dukkhanirodhagamini patipada’ti khvassa, avuso, annatam adittham appattam asacchikatam anabhisametam.
an9.13:21.7: Tassa nanaya dassanaya pattiya sacchikiriyaya abhisamayaya bhagavati brahmacariyam vussati.
an9.13:21.8: Idam khvassa, avuso, annatam adittham appattam asacchikatam anabhisametam.
an9.13:21.9: Tassa nanaya dassanaya pattiya sacchikiriyaya abhisamayaya bhagavati brahmacariyam vussati”ti.
